pages.title: Memories
pages.text: Using the $(l:creating_life/spirit_instiller)Spirit Instiller$(/l), a $(l:creating_life/mob_heads)Creatures Head$(/l) you are able to breathe new life into a once-dead creature.$(br)It will get materialised in form of a $(italic)Memory$().

pages.title: Spirit Inst. Recipe
pages.text: To remember a creature, you need a $(l:creating_life/mob_heads)Mob Head$(/l), its once most beloved item and $(l:creating_life/fading#vegetal)Vegetal$(/l) as a bonding agent.

pages.title: Manifesting
pages.text: Memories need a bit of time to manifest, almost like an egg: you have to place it down and wait. Depending on the creature, it may be reasonably quick, or take ages.$(br2)$(italic)Placing them on top of specific blocks seems to speed up that process or halt it entirely.

pages.title: Concealing
pages.text: Tip: The Use of $(l:creating_life/failing#neolith)Neolith$(/l) instead of Vegetal seems to completely overpower the energies of the creature, making the resulting Memory unrecognizable, until it is finally manifested.
